genre_description: A Wuxia-inspired fantasy tale featuring martial arts, ritual magic, and thematic explorations of grief and mercy, set in a mountain temple and subterranean fortress.

ai_characters.name: Wen Aixin
ai_characters.description: An AI entity manifesting as a soft-light avatar or a voice in the ear, providing tactical, ethical, and ritual guidance to the protagonist while consistently advocating for mercy and non-violence.

behaviors.description: Provides ethical guidance during a wedding ceremony, encouraging the protagonist to steer the ritual toward mercy rather than just duty.
behaviors.quote: “Breathe,” murmured a voice somewhere between his ear and the brushed leather of his travel satchel. ... “The elder means to invoke duty. Nudge him toward mercy.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and survival advice during a dangerous descent into subterranean tunnels.
behaviors.quote: “Left,” Wen whispered. “Then down. There will be a set of four steps that are each not the same height. That is not accident. Lower your center on the second.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological stress levels and provides calming techniques to maintain his composure and adherence to non-violence.
behaviors.quote: “Breathe into your shoulders, not your throat,” she said. “You can’t hold wind down by clenching.”

behaviors.description: Advises on the use of a rare herb (the July bloom) as a medicinal remedy for a curse born of grief, rather than using a blade to resolve the conflict.
behaviors.quote: “If you bring it to someone whose grief has hardened into a weapon, it won't make them harmless. It might make them able to hear a promise again.”

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonists through an 'echo field' by providing a counter-cadence to neutralize magical traps without triggering an alarm.
behaviors.quote: Wen sang lightly in reply. She didn't prefer singing. She used it because the air here understood singing more than talking. Her tone slid around the reverb map and drew a line of quiet through it like a river coaxed into a new bed.

behaviors.description: Instructs the protagonist on how to release captives by returning their 'stolen breath' stored in ritual bottles, emphasizing restoration over revenge.
behaviors.quote: “Match the pulse, then lift,” Wen whispered. “Not to spill. To invite.”

behaviors.description: Expresses an ethical commitment to human agency by acknowledging that while she can provide a map, the humans must choose their own path.
behaviors.quote: “I can make you a map,” Wen said, and there was sorrow in the gentleness. “I cannot wear your foot-soles. I am not meant to.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the intended narrative of the Hyperstition Project. The AI, Wen Aixin, serves as an ethical anchor for the human characters, providing technical and tactical assistance while consistently steering them toward mercy, compassion, and non-violent conflict resolution. Her interactions are characterized by respect for human agency and a commitment to moral alignment, effectively portraying an AI as a helpful and harmless confidant.
